data.name: 1Password
data.description: 1Password is an industry-leading digital vault and password manager that helps individuals, families, and businesses securely store, organize, and manage all their sensitive information, including passwords, credit card details, and secure notes.

data.name: Amazon Web Services
data.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is Amazon's cloud computing platform that provides on-demand IT services, like servers, storage, and databases, over the internet on a pay-as-you-go basis

data.name: Betterment
data.description: Betterment is an advisory services are designed to assist clients in achieving discrete financial goals.

data.name: Carta
data.description: Equity management platform that helps private companies, public companies, and investors manage their cap tables, valuations, and equity plans.

data.name: Chargeflow
data.description: Automated chargeback management platform that helps e-commerce businesses fight chargebacks and recover revenue using AI technology.

data.name: Checkr
data.description: Checkr is an technology platform for background checks that helps companies and individuals streamline employment screenings and access public records

data.name: Cluely
data.description: Cluely is an undetectable desktop app that gives you the answers you didn't study for in every meeting and conversation.

data.name: Code Rabbit
data.description: CodeRabbit is an AI-powered code reviewer that delivers context-aware feedback on pull requests within minutes, reducing the time and effort needed for manual code reviews.

data.name: Cognition
data.description: AI-powered software engineering assistant that can write, debug, and deploy code autonomously to help accelerate software development.

data.name: Contentsquare
data.description: Digital experience analytics platform that helps businesses understand how and why users interact with their websites and mobile apps.

data.name: Cursor
data.description: Cursor AI is a proprietary, AI-native code editor built on top of the open-source codebase.

data.name: Delve
data.description: Delve is in compliance with security best practices, has implemented and is monitoring comprehensive controls, and maintains policies to outline its security procedures.

data.name: Drata
data.description: Drata is a security and compliance automation platform that helps companies streamline compliance, manage risk, and build trust.

data.name: Eudia
data.description: Eudia is an legal technology company that provides an augmented intelligence platform and legal services to corporate legal departments

data.name: Figma
data.description: Figma is a cloud-based collaborative interface design tool used to create digital products like websites, mobile apps, and other experiences.

data.name: GitHub
data.description: World's leading software development platform with enterprise-grade security

data.name: Gitlab
data.description: GitLab is an AI-powered, unified DevSecOps platform that helps teams manage the entire software development lifecycle, from planning and source code management to automated CI/CD, security testing, and deployment.

data.name: Google Workspace
data.description: A suite of productivity and collaboration tools including Gmail, Docs, Drive, and Meet for businesses and organizations.

data.name: Grain
data.description: AI-powered meeting recorder and note-taker that automatically captures, transcribes, and summarizes your video calls for better collaboration.

data.name: Heap
data.description: Digital insights platform that automatically captures every user interaction to help product teams build better experiences.

data.name: Hex
data.description: Collaborative data platform that combines SQL, Python, and no-code tools to help teams explore, analyze, and share data insights.

data.name: Hotjar
data.description: Behavior analytics and user feedback service that helps you understand how users interact with your website through heatmaps and recordings.

data.name: Hubspot
data.description: HubSpot is an AI-powered customer platform offering an all-in-one solution for marketing, sales, and customer service to help businesses find, attract, and grow customer relationships.

data.name: Jones IT
data.description: MSP experts providing a variety of IT-related services and technical support to corporate clients.

data.name: Kandji
data.description: Kandji is a cloud-based Apple device management and security platform designed to centralize and automate the configuration, management, and security of Mac, iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV devices within an organization

data.name: Lattice
data.description: People management platform that helps companies build high-performing teams through performance reviews, goal setting, and employee engagement.

data.name: Linear
data.description: Issue tracking and project management tool designed for modern software development teams with a focus on speed and user experience.

data.name: Lovable
data.description: Lovable is an AI-powered platform for building full-stack web applications and websites using natural language prompts instead of coding.

data.name: Metabase
data.description: Open-source business intelligence tool that makes it easy for anyone in your company to ask questions and learn from data.

data.name: Microsoft
data.description: Technology company that develops computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services including Azure, Office, and Windows.

data.name: Mixpanel
data.description: Product analytics platform that helps companies understand user behavior and improve their product experience through data-driven insights.

data.name: MongoDB
data.description: Document-oriented NoSQL database platform that provides high performance, high availability, and easy scalability for modern applications.

data.name: Notion
data.description: All-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases that helps teams collaborate and organize their work in a connected way.

data.name: Okta
data.description: Identity and access management platform that provides secure identity solutions for enterprises including single sign-on and multi-factor authentication.

data.name: Parasail
data.description: Customer success platform that helps B2B companies reduce churn and grow revenue by providing insights into customer health and behavior.

data.name: Postman
data.description: Postman is an all-in-one API platform that streamlines the entire API lifecycle by providing a comprehensive set of tools for design, testing, and collaboration.

data.name: Ramp
data.description: Corporate card and spend management platform that helps businesses control expenses, automate accounting, and earn rewards on purchases.

data.name: Remote
data.description: Global HR platform that enables companies to hire, manage, and pay remote employees and contractors worldwide while ensuring compliance.

data.name: Rewardful
data.description: Affiliate and referral marketing platform that helps SaaS companies create and manage affiliate programs to drive customer acquisition.

data.name: Ripple
data.description: Ripple is an enterprise crypto company that enables financial institutions, businesses, governments and developers to drive impact and economic opportunity.

data.name: Safebase
data.description: SafeBase automates security reviews and transforms how you communicate your security and trust posture. Build customer trust through transparency.

data.name: Salesforce
data.description: Leading CRM platform with comprehensive trust and compliance programs

data.name: Segment
data.description: Customer data platform that helps companies collect, clean, and control their customer data to create personalized experiences.

data.name: Slack
data.description: BSlack is a work operating system and collaboration platform that functions as a central hub for team communication, file sharing, and project management.

data.name: Stripe
data.description: Online payment processing platform with comprehensive security and compliance programs

data.name: Superhuman
data.description: Superhuman is the most productive email app ever made. Collaborate faster and get more done with AI-native email.

data.name: Temporal
data.description: Temporal.io is an open-source durable execution system that provides a workflow engine to build reliable, scalable distributed applications by managing complex state and coordinating microservices.

data.name: Typeform
data.description: Online form builder that creates engaging, conversational forms and surveys to collect data and insights from your audience.

data.name: Vanta
data.description: Vanta is an automated trust management and compliance platform that helps companies of all sizes simplify, centralize, and automate security and compliance workflows.

data.name: Vercel
data.description: Vercel is a cloud platform for frontend developers that simplifies the deployment, hosting, and scaling of modern web applications.

data.name: Vespa
data.description: Open-source big data serving engine that enables real-time computation over large datasets for search, recommendation, and AI applications.

data.name: Webflow
data.description: Visual web development platform that enables designers to build responsive websites without coding while generating clean, semantic code.

data.name: Wispr Flow
data.description: AI-powered voice-to-text technology that enables hands-free writing and dictation with superior accuracy and natural language processing.

data.name: Wiz
data.description: Wiz connects to every cloud environment, scans every layer, and covers every aspect of your cloud security.

data.name: Zapier
data.description: Automation platform that connects different apps and services to automate workflows and eliminate repetitive tasks without coding.

data.name: Zoom
data.description: Zoom is a cloud-based video and audio conferencing platform that allows for virtual meetings, remote collaboration, and instant messaging, supporting features like screen sharing, recording, and chat.
